title: Gujrati Signage — Premium 3D single-page marketing site with intro helper

requirements.summary: Implement premium minimal responsive visual system (palette, typography, spacing) conveying legacy, trust, and innovation.
acceptanceCriteria: All key pages/sections render correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop without horizontal overflow.
Typography uses strong headline styling and readable body text with a premium minimal aesthetic.
Overall palette adheres to black/white/silver/neutrals with restrained accent usage (no flashy colors dominating).

file_operations.description: Create global styling entry with Tailwind directives plus premium palette tokens (black/white/metallic-silver/soft neutrals), typography defaults, section spacing, and safe motion defaults (reduced-motion).
Extend Tailwind theme to support premium typography scale, neutral/silver accent utilities, and animation primitives used across sections.
Create a responsive layout wrapper (max widths, padding, balanced whitespace) and shared visual treatments for light/dark section blocks.

requirements.summary: Build single-page section structure with smooth in-page navigation, cinematic transitions/parallax feel, and performant micro-animations.
acceptanceCriteria: Navigation (header links or in-page anchors) can scroll to each section smoothly.
Each section has subtle motion/transition that remains performant and does not block scrolling.
A mix of light and dark section backgrounds is used to create depth (especially around the gallery/showcase area).

file_operations.description: Create the single-page landing view that composes Hero, About, Services, Gallery, Why Choose Us, and Contact sections with semantic section anchors/IDs and alternating light/dark depth blocks.

Create a sticky header with in-page anchor links that smooth-scroll to each section; use shadcn-ui components (e.g., Button/Sheet) for accessible navigation. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire the marketing landing page into the app as the primary view, including header navigation and the section composition so there are no orphan sections.

requirements.summary: Implement the Hero with exact headline, two CTAs, scroll cue, and animated 3D signage/light-board visual.
acceptanceCriteria: Hero displays the exact headline text and two CTAs.
“Contact Us” CTA scrolls to the Contact section; “View Our Work” scrolls to the Gallery/Showcase section.
Hero contains an animated 3D element with soft lighting/shadows/reflections consistent with the premium aesthetic.

file_operations.description: Create Hero section with headline “Crafting Signage Excellence Since 1960”, CTAs, scroll cue, and an animated 3D hero visual using the generated assets and subtle motion; use shadcn-ui Button for CTAs. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add Hero section at top and wire CTA click handlers to smooth-scroll to #contact and #work.
Add generated static asset for the hero background: frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-backdrop.dim_1920x1080.png.
Add generated static asset for the hero 3D signage element: frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-signage-3d.dim_1400x900.png.

requirements.summary: Add first-load intro: animated phone UI + helper avatar asking “How can I help you?” with quick actions and dismiss/skip.
acceptanceCriteria: On first load, a phone pop-up animation plays and the helper character appears with the text “How can I help you?” (English).
The intro provides at least 3 quick actions that navigate to relevant sections and a visible dismiss/skip control.
If dismissed, the user can continue using the site normally; the intro does not block access to content.

file_operations.description: Create an intro overlay/modal that animates a phone frame + helper avatar, shows “How can I help you?” and quick actions (Contact/Services/View Work) plus a dismiss/skip control; use shadcn-ui Dialog and Button for accessibility. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a small hook that stores intro dismissed state (e.g., localStorage) so it only shows on first load unless cleared.
Mount IntroHelperOverlay at app start and wire quick actions to smooth-scroll to #contact, #services, and #work without blocking page access after dismissal.
Add generated static asset for the intro phone UI: frontend/public/assets/generated/intro-phone.dim_900x1200.png.
Add generated static asset for the helper avatar: frontend/public/assets/generated/helper-avatar.dim_1024x1024.png.

requirements.summary: Implement About Us section with concise legacy/craft/trust copy (Established in 1960) and subtle text reveal animations.
acceptanceCriteria: About section explicitly mentions “Established in 1960” and communicates legacy/trust/craftsmanship in concise premium copy.
Text reveal/scroll animations are subtle and do not cause layout shift.

file_operations.description: Create About Us section with premium copy emphasizing “Established in 1960”, experience, precision, and long-term trust, including subtle reveal animations that avoid layout shift.
Wire About section into the single-page structure with a semantic section wrapper and in-page anchor.

requirements.summary: Implement Our Services as premium interactive 3D service cards for six specified services with accessible interactions.
acceptanceCriteria: All six services are displayed as distinct cards with consistent styling.
Cards have 3D depth via lighting/shadow/tilt (mouse hover on desktop; subtle press interaction on mobile).
Cards remain accessible: text readable, focus states visible, and interactions do not depend solely on hover.

file_operations.description: Create Services section rendering six premium 3D-tilt cards (Building Signages, Name Plates, Number Plates, Light Boards, Custom Sign Boards, Radium Stickers) using shadcn-ui Card/Button primitives and accessible focus/press interactions. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire Services section into the page with id #services and ensure navigation/intro quick action can scroll to it.

requirements.summary: Create Work Showcase/Gallery with high-quality visuals, smooth transitions, and immersive scrolling consistent with the premium look.
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays a grid or cinematic carousel with multiple images and smooth transitions.
Images are optimized for web (reasonable file size) and use proper responsive sizing.
Section visually alternates or blends light/dark backgrounds to add depth without reducing readability.

file_operations.description: Create a premium gallery section (grid + optional cinematic lightbox/carousel feel) with smooth transitions; use shadcn-ui Dialog for an accessible image viewer when images are opened. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire Gallery section into the page with id #work and ensure the section uses a darker/contrasting background block to add depth.

Add generated gallery static asset: frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-04.dim_1600x1000.png.

requirements.summary: Implement Why Choose Us section with four reasons, minimal metallic icons, and subtle animations.
acceptanceCriteria: All four reasons appear with minimal icons and subtle motion (e.g., small hover/scroll reveal).
Layout is clean and consistent with premium minimal UI and whitespace.

file_operations.description: Create Why Choose Us section listing the four required reasons with minimal metallic icons and subtle reveal/hover motion; use accessible markup and consistent spacing.
Add styling helpers to render and position the 4-icon metallic sprite (icon sizing, background positioning, and high-contrast behavior for light/dark sections).
Wire Why Choose Us section into the single-page layout with a semantic section wrapper.
Add generated static asset for icon sprite: frontend/public/assets/generated/why-icons-sprite.dim_1024x1024.png.

requirements.summary: Build Contact section with exact contact details, click-to-call, mailto, and social links with refined hover effects.
acceptanceCriteria: Phone numbers are clickable (tel: links) and visually presented as buttons or prominent links.
Email is clickable (mailto:) and displayed clearly.
Instagram and Facebook links open in a new tab and have refined hover/focus states.
All contact info matches the provided values exactly.

file_operations.description: Create Contact section with elegant layout showing Phone (9828939660, 9828054199), Email (vikratpatell77.vp@gmail.com), and social links (Instagram/Facebook) using shadcn-ui Button for prominent actions and refined hover/focus states. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Wire Contact section into the page with id #contact so CTAs and intro actions can scroll to it.

requirements.summary: Add SEO-friendly semantic structure, heading hierarchy, meta title/description, and accessible image alt text.
acceptanceCriteria: Heading hierarchy is logical (single H1, section H2s, etc.).
Page has a descriptive title and meta description referencing Gujrati Signage and “Since 1960”.
All meaningful images have non-empty alt text; decorative images are marked appropriately.

file_operations.description: Update document title and add a meta description referencing “Gujrati Signage” and “Since 1960”, keeping the page marketing-focused.
Ensure semantic sectioning (section/nav/header/footer), a single H1 in the Hero, H2s for each section, and accessible labels for navigation.
Ensure all gallery and service/hero images include appropriate alt text (non-empty for meaningful images; decorative marked appropriately).

requirements.summary: Use the uploaded WhatsApp image as a brand/logo asset and ensure it stays crisp and legible on light/dark backgrounds.
acceptanceCriteria: The uploaded image is included as a static asset and used as the brand logo in at least one prominent location.
Logo remains legible on both light and dark surfaces (via layout, background treatment, or subtle shadow/glow).

file_operations.description: Add the uploaded logo image as a static public asset (source: WhatsApp Image 2026-02-09 at 14.40.31.jpeg) for reuse in header/hero.
Render the logo prominently in the header and apply a subtle backdrop/halo/shadow treatment so it remains legible on both light and dark section backgrounds.
Optionally echo the logo in the hero (or hero lockup) with crisp rendering and contrast-safe treatment.

requirements.summary: Add and render all required generated static images for hero/services/gallery/intro as frontend public assets (no backend image handling).
acceptanceCriteria: All images listed in imageRequirements.required are present as static files and referenced by the UI.
No backend endpoints are used for serving or generating images at runtime.
Images match the black/white/silver/neutral premium aesthetic and are used in the intended sections (hero/services/gallery/intro).

file_operations.description: Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-backdrop.dim_1920x1080.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-signage-3d.dim_1400x900.png as static images (no backend), with responsive sizing and performance-minded loading.

Reference frontend/public/assets/generated/intro-phone.dim_900x1200.png and frontend/public/assets/generated/helper-avatar.dim_1024x1024.png as static images (no backend) and ensure they are sized responsively.

Reference service images as static assets in each service card: frontend/public/assets/generated/service-building-signages.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-name-plates.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-number-plates.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-light-boards.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-custom-sign-boards.dim_1200x800.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/service-radium-stickers.dim_1200x800.png.
